content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":415310,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"first day.PNG\",\"name\":\"first day.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4cf03c8c-c320-4372-83a3-0ad9fac600e2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":881,\"height\":285},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Earlier you've received the \\\"EPAM Invitation letter\\\", so you already know where and at what time your first EPAM day begins.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It starts in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM office\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" where you'll be invited to fill in documents, sign NDA contract, and take a photo for EPAM internal systems.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After that, you'll meet your \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HR Personal Assistant\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" from People Management Team - whose aim is to help you integrate into EPAM and provide you informational support during the probation period. You'll have a brief introduction to EPAM, it's internal tools, rules and will be proposed to have a short office tour.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The final step for your first day is to meet your \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Manager and team.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Check your working place, get acquainted with your first tasks and enjoy being part of the global EPAM team.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After you login to EPAM systems and set up your working place please write a few words about yourself to WFA Onboarding RU, so we can present you to EPAM St. Petersburg office.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
